ai-patthana15.75:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.75:0.3_0: Seeing the thought of moving for oneself,
ai-patthana15.75:2.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected. ...
ai-patthana15.75:4.1_0: (They are) without placing the mind and keeping it connected. ...
ai-patthana15.75:4.1_3: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana15.75:5.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected. ...
